settings.code: Pain Relief in Just 25 minutes per day - Or your money back guaranteed*

settings.text: Results in 60-days or your money back

settings.use_texted:
• The most advanced, FDA-cleared system to restore your lower back health and provide lasting pain relief.
  • Equipped with pre-set, clinically studied NMES & TENS modes, the Whole Body Corrective Therapy Device® 2.0 delivers proven electrical stimulation to correct the source of the pain.
  • Join our biggest sale and start your path to relief. Get multiple devices to save big and maximize your results, plus enjoy a 60-day at-home trial.
  • Not advised for use with electronic implants. See FAQ below for more info.
settings.use_text:
Using up to 6 NeuroMD devices at once helps target more muscles and nerves, expanding the treatment area and enhancing your results. This approach is ideal for addressing various pain types, including back pain, leg pain, and neuropathy.

Key Usage Guidelines

  • • 23 modes for various pain types (back, arthritis, foot, chronic pain)
  • • Use 4-7 days per week for best results
  • • NMES & TENS: Up to 3 daily sessions per muscle group
  • • Unlimited daily use for massage modes
  • • Sessions last 25-60 minutes, depending on the mode

settings.title: Reviews
settings.content:
Be the First to Review Our Newest Device!

NeuroMD is trusted by over 200,000 happy customers and has earned 8,000+ five-star reviews across Judge.me, Google, and the Better Business Bureau.

settings.testimonial: “Your physical therapist & massage therapist in an at-home device.”

settings.text_01: Sensory and motor nerves are stimulated with NMES & TENS technology – contracting and relaxing your muscles during a quick 25 minute recovery session.
By following the included 12 week recovery program, damaged tissue will begin to heal and inflammation reduces as your joint stabilizing muscles are strengthened.
Pain is diminished in as little as 2 weeks. After 12 weeks, use your device on maintenance mode for continued relief.

settings.heading:
Say goodbye to Back, Neck,
Foot and Leg Pain
settings.text:
Tired of dealing with persistent muscle discomfort? The NeuroMD Whole Body Corrective Therapy Device offers a breakthrough solution to help you feel your best—no matter where your pain is.

Simply place the NeuroMD over your area of pain and begin feeling relief.

settings.reviewtitle: It’s working great for my elbow pain
settings.reviewcontent: As a tennis player, I've been struggling with elbow pain for quite some time. NeuroMD's device has been instrumental in my recovery. The pain is 100% gone and I can play without any flare-ups. Highly recommended for anyone dealing with chronic pain.

settings.reviewtitle: I use it religiously to keep me strong and out of pain.
settings.reviewcontent: I am very pleased with the progress made by using NeuroMD. I have followed the directions to the T and am experiencing good improvement. I have scoliosis, sciatica, along with hip and knee issues. My body is a bit of a wreck but im feeling stronger and in much less pain. I will continue using NeuroMD for as long as needed.

settings.reviewtitle: Finally Relief for Neck and Shoulder Pain!
settings.reviewcontent: As someone whos had debilitating tight knots in my right-sided neck and a herniated disc at C3, along with shoulder arthritis and rotator cuff issues, I can attest to the effectiveness of NeuroMDs Whole Body Corrective Therapy Device. This has been a genuine lifesaver.

settings.reviewtitle: Upgraded as a long time user of their original device.
settings.reviewcontent: Using NeuroMD's original device transformed my chronic back pain. Their new Whole Body Device is even better, I love it. I can use it anywhere I have pain and it’s been great for my arthritis-ridden knees, improving mobility and reducing discomfort noticeably. The new Complete Relief Program is a genius add-on because it provides an all in one treatment. A+ from me.

I've been battling with sciatica for years, and the pain in my buttock was unbearable at times. The pain is almost completely gone, and I can now go about my day without the constant discomfort. I highly recommend this to anyone dealing with sciatica

settings.heading: Targeted Relief Anywhere you need it.
settings.text: Powered by advanced Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation (NMES) technology, this device targets areas of muscle tension and discomfort, promoting relaxation and temporary relief in just 25 minutes a day.

settings.text_01: Plug in the USB-C cable to the device and remote to charge them.
Attach the device(s) to the sticky pad
Place the device(s) on your body, select your mode and intensity using the remote, and enjoy a 25-minute session for lasting pain relief
Wireless design with remote control is easy to apply and use without assistance.
Corrects the source of pain without masking.

settings.heading: Lasting relief that puts an end to surgical procedures, shots, braces, and medications.

settings.stepdescription: The program starts by warming up muscles in the treatment area with low-intensity contractions.
In the second phase, varied pulses are used to stimulate both fast and slow muscle fibers.
Contractions are reduced in frequency to allow for muscle recovery and sustained blood flow.
In the pain management stage the program targets acute pain, chronic pain, back pain, and arthritis.
The final massage therapy stage completely relaxes all muscle tension to end the treatment.

settings.main_title: Complete Relief Program®:  Your Five-Step Journey to Ultimate Pain Relief and Enhanced Mobility
settings.description: Place the NeuroMD over your area of pain and begin to feel relief as it goes through a 5 stage program.

settings.title: NeuroMD works to prevent pain for good
settings.list_title_1: NeuroMD works to prevent pain for good
settings.list_title_2: Muscle strengthening & improved range of motion

settings.main_title1: Whether your pain is chronic or acute, arthritic or muscular, there’s a program specifically for you.
settings.feature_description1: Designed to fit effortlessly into your daily routine. Here's how you can optimize your usage:
settings.feature_description2: We recommend using any of our specialized programs once daily per muscle group. This approach allows your body to adapt and respond positively to the therapy, enhancing pain relief and muscle strength over time. Remember, you have the flexibility to increase usage up to three times daily if needed.
settings.feature_description3: Our massage programs are your go-to for relaxation and comfort, available for use as often as you wish throughout the day. Whether you need a mid-day relaxation break or a soothing end-of-day session, our massage programs are designed to provide immediate relaxation.

settings.heading: Don’t let pain control your life
settings.text:
Experience a transformation in mobility and pain relief with our device. It's more
than a tool—it's your partner in health, paving the way for a future where each
day is filled with hope, comfort, and the freedom of movement.
settings.label: Shop Now

settings.proof_content_1: Neuromuscular electrical stimulation training results in enhanced activation of spinal stabilizing muscles during spinal loading and improvements in pain ratings.
settings.proof_content_2: "Analysis of results revealed clinically and statistically significant improvements in indicators of both muscle groups' performance, as evidenced by ultrasound evaluation of activation during voluntary activity. These improvements were associated with significant improvements in self reported pain levels, suggesting that NMES has an important role to play in Chronic Lower Back Pain rehabilitation."
settings.proof_content_3: Coghlan, S., Crowe, L., McCarthypersson, U., Minogue, C., & Caulfield, B. Retrieved from https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22256103/

settings.proof_content_1: The effects of neuromuscular electrical stimulation on the activation of deep lumbar stabilizing muscles of patients with lumbar degenerative kyphosis.
settings.proof_content_2: "In conclusion, lumbar stabilizing muscles of patients with Lumbar Degenerative Kyphosis were significantly activated by NMES. Protocol A+B maximally stimulated all the studied deep spinal stabilizing muscles (LM, TrA and OI) as evidenced by RUSI. The protocol A+B may aid the development of practical NMES systems for LDK patients who suffer from postural deformity and Lower Back Pain”
settings.proof_content_3: Kim, S. Y., Kim, J. H., Jung, G. S., Baek, S. O., Jones, R., & Ahn, S. H. (2016, February. Retrieved from https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4792980/

settings.proof_content_1: Clinical effects of electrical stimulation therapy on lumbar disc herniation-induced sciatica and its influence on peripheral ROS level.
settings.proof_content_2: "In conclusion, in the treatment of lumbar disc herniation-induced sciatica, electrical stimulation therapy can effectively reduce the pain degree, relieve the clinical symptoms and signs, improve the peripheral ROS level and prevent the oxidative damage of myocardial tissues and other complications, so it is worthy of clinical application and promotion."
settings.proof_content_3: Wang, L., Fan, W., Yu, C., Lang, M., & Sun, G. (2018, September). Retrieved from https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6146184

settings.proof_content_1: Trunk Muscle Training Augmented with Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation Appears to Improve Function in Older Adults with Chronic Low Back Pain: A Randomized Preliminary Trial
settings.proof_content_2: "In conclusion, this preliminary investigation has demonstrated that TMT+NMES is a safe and acceptable intervention that may have the potential to improve physical function in older adults with chronic LBP. It is particularly interesting to note that TMT+NMES appears to have the potential to result in longer term functional improvements than our passive control approach which was grounded in the use of passive treatments."
settings.proof_content_3: Hicks, G. E., Sions, J. M., Velasco, T. O., & Manal, T. J. (2016, October). Retrieved from https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4935645/

settings.proof_content_1: Electrical muscle stimulation as an adjunct to exercise therapy in the treatment of nonacute low back pain: a randomized trial.
settings.proof_content_2: "At the 2-month follow-up interval, subjects in the treatment group had statistically significantly improved lumbar spine function compared with the control subjects. This effect continued during the last 4 months of the study after electrical stimulation had been discontinued. This suggests that electrical muscle stimulation can be an effective adjunctive treatment modality for nonacute low back pain. The effects of this combined therapy seem to last beyond the duration of electrical stimulation treatment."
settings.proof_content_3: Glaser, J. A., Baltz, M. A., Nietert, P. J., & Bensen, C. V. (2001, October). Retrieved from https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/14622808

I've tried PT, nerve ablation, chiropractors, you name it and nothing worked. If you have back pain, look into the corrective therapy device. I can't thank NeuroMD enough. Thank you!

settings.title: How does your 60 day at-home trial work?
settings.text: At NeuroMD, our pride is not only in our products, but in the results and progress our customers achieve. We know the NeuroMD device works and we are so confident in its effectiveness that we provide a 60-day at-home trial. If for any reason your NeuroMD device does not provide you with the level of relief from chronic pain that you were expecting, you may return it for a refund at any time within 60 days of delivery. Please see our return policy here.

settings.title: Does NeuroMD accept FSA or HSA?
settings.text: Yes, you can use your HSA (Health Savings Account) or an FSA (Flexible Spending Account) debit card like you would any other credit card. The NeuroMD Corrective Therapy Device® is eligible for use with either account. Electrotherapy Pain Relief Device reimbursement is not eligible with a limited-purpose flexible spending account (LPFSA) or a dependent care flexible spending account (DCFSA).

settings.title: Can I use insurance to pay for NeuroMD?
settings.text:
Depending on your plan, you may be reimbursed directly from your insurance company after purchasing your back pain device. We don’t accept direct payment from insurance companies, but we provide a proof of purchase itemized receipt via email and will help you in the reimbursement process.

Insurance coverage varies depending on the insurance company, the plan, and condition being treated. For example, Medicare's coverage states the following: "All uses of NMES other than for the treatment of disuse atrophy in neurologically intact patients and for walking in SCI patients remain non-covered."

settings.title: Do you offer an affordable payment plan?
settings.text:
Because we've partnered with ShopPay & Splitit, you have many options starting at only $18 out of pocket today to get the device.

Pay in 4 interest-free installments or from $18.05/mo with ShopPay.

Or select "Monthly credit card payments. No interest/fees" at checkout for interest-free payments over 3, 6, or 12 months through Splitit.

settings.title: Will NeuroMD work for my pain?
settings.text: Back and leg pain is complex. However, NeuroMD's back pain relief machine is unique as it works for the majority of people because it improves musculoskeletal function and health. The device reduces pain by healing damaged tissues, lowering inflammation, and strengthening spinal stabilizing muscles. Remember you can try NeuroMD with our 60-Day Home Trial Program.

settings.title: How is NeuroMD different?
settings.text:
NeuroMD engineered the first ever Corrective Therapy Device® that delivers clinically studied NMES parameters. When using NeuroMD’s patent-pending FDA cleared class II medical device, you're getting a scientifically sound treatment backed by years of research and millions of dollars in R&D.

There is no other company with our device. Be wary of knockoffs and report them by contacting Legal@GetNeuroMD.com.

settings.title: Who should not use NeuroMD?
settings.text: It is always recommended to consult with your physician before starting any new exercise program or treatment modality. We do not recommend using the NeuroMD Corrective Therapy Device directly over any metallic implants. Patients with any electronic implants such as a pacemaker are not advised to use the Corrective Therapy Device. For a full list please click here.

settings.title: What's included and how do I use NeuroMD?
settings.text:
WHAT'S INCLUDED:

•Pre-programmed device with clinically studied parameters

•Dual ended charging cable for device and remote

•Rechargeable LCD screen remote

•Treatment protocol & exercise guide

•2x long-lasting electrode gel-pads (3 month supply)

•Ziplock storage pouch

settings.title: Can I use the device on other areas of my body?
settings.text:
The NeuroMD Corrective Therapy Device® can be used on other areas; however, we do not recommend use on the front of the neck, across the chest, or on the head.
The device will improve musculoskeletal health and function on the area it is applied. For example, if you're having muscle spasms in your mid back, you would apply the device in that area.

In order to obtain the best degree of pain relief with NeuroMD, we recommend the following pad placement guidelines:

1. Take note of exactly where your pain is located. Outline the most concise and tender area of the pain.
2. The pad can be placed in one of three directions 1. vertical 2. horizontal 3. angulated.
3. It is advisable not to place the pad directly over a joint such as the knee, elbow or ankle as its movement can alter the adherence of the pad.
4. Increase intensity gradually as each body part will tolerate a different level of intensity
Note: Pad placement as well as intensity level tolerance varies from person to person. We recommend following our guidelines and doing what feels best for you.
